extendedInfo.description: "It's absolutely bonkers, and I can't recommend it enough"  > androidrundown.comCompete in the ultimate test of Strength! Endurance! and Skill! For up 4 players! Go for Gold in 15 events: * Diving * Javelin * Equestrian * 100m Dash * Rowing * Gymnastic Rings * High Jump * Pole Vault * Weightlifting * Swimming * Racewalking * Hammer Throw * Cycling * Archery * Whitewater Slalom

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I haven\'t even played it yet but I know it is awesome go on YouTube and type in realistic summer sports simulator rage quit it is so funny
reviews.author: Ethan DeMarco

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Played with my buddies at work, they were thoroughly confused and so was I. Laughs were had by all. Cheeky game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Super fun! Not to be confused,  super hard also,  really took some time till I started winning. And never gets too easy. My friends suck at it so hope multiplayer is on the way
reviews.author: Valentin Markolini

reviews.title: the best!
reviews.comment: best game ever, want more sports though!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: By far the best sports game I have ever played.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Idle Thumbs recommended
reviews.comment: Idle Thumbs guys made me buy the game. Really awesome simulation!
reviews.author: Juha Meriruoho

reviews.title: Brilliant game.
reviews.comment: This game is stupidly difficult, make no mistake, but it\'s so much fun that I really don\'t care. I thoroughly recommend it to anyone who doesn\'t take things too seriously. Well done to the dev for the update, also. The game now works perfectly on my Galaxy S III.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tongue planted in cheek
reviews.comment: Love this game for all it does and doesn\'t do. A great diversion. Lovingly lo-fi!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: We need more developers like you!
reviews.comment: I can\'t get over just how much this little game brings me joy. I love playing games that don\'t take themselves seriously, though I often find games that \"try to be funny\" and I end up deleting them right away.   So my hats off to you developer. 10/10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good from afar, far from good.
reviews.comment: After watching the trailer of this game I bought it immediately, only to find out that what I saw on the trailer was nearly impossible to do unless you wrote the game.  On face value the game had what it took to make me buy it and play it for an hour, just not any of what it takes to keep me playing it. Not only did I not accomplish anything, when my son came over to play it and started getting confused I took it from his hands to mitigate the loss of intelligence.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The funniest game I\'ve played on a mobile device
reviews.comment: I don\'t know why this isn\'t the most popular game in the Android Market.  Premise: you do sports.  Problem: you have no idea how to actually control your guy. Furthermore, actually knowing *how* to control him is very different than *successfully* controlling him.  In most cases you have a weird rubber band mechanic (imagine something like the opposite of the Angry Birds slingshot) that you use to drag guys and objects around to complete objectives. Sounds easy right? Well, it\'s not. It\'s all complicated by the fact that your guy and the objects around him have some sublimely bizarre and exceptionally Realistic physics that cause... well, they cause weird stuff to happen.  This game is a joke - kind of. But this game is also a game. A lot of what makes it fun is that it doesn\'t give you any idea how to play the thing at all, and as you experiment with the various physics models completely insane things happen.  Pay your two bucks and play this thing. Just do it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s just you, a dead athlete, and a bungee cord.
reviews.comment: All right, imagine this.  You\'re participating in the decathlon, except you can\'t actually move.  Your only chance to win the gold is if someone drags your body to the finish line with a stretchy nylon rope.  It\'s morbid, but that\'s the reality in Realistic Summer Sports Challenge.  Every event has you attach a cable to something- a weight, a horse, or even the athlete himself- and tug it along to complete the challenge.  It will take practice, and you will get frustrated, but ultimately, you will be amused.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Though the graphics may be slightly less eye catching than current systems, this game delivers a physics powerhouse that can be denied by no man. If I could rate more than 5 I would not hesitate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Practice is for losers.
reviews.comment: You always need to go for the gold. Constant crashes on the Kayak event are depressing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wacky awesomeness
reviews.comment: Simply hilarious.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game! Needs a few updates though!
reviews.comment: This game is a blast, especially with friends. But rowing physics make it unplayable, the weight lifting tower needs to not move, and the diving water entry needs to be lenient. Then it will be perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun concept, technical issues
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing on the HTC One X as soon as I try almost any input. Looks to be a very fun game, but I\'m unable to play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too realistic!
reviews.comment: I played this too much and now I\'ve forgotten how to do sports in real life; help!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A racewalkers dream
reviews.comment: I like this game even before child birth. 6/6 stars for you, keep fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game.
reviews.comment: Well worth the price. Hilarious and fun at the same time!
reviews.author: A Google User
